mapper.insert: insert into w_user (user_id, user_openid, user_name, user_avatarurl, user_truename, user_sex, user_age, user_tel, user_birthday, user_ctime, user_creattime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAvatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTruename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userCtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userCreattime,jdbcType=DATE})
